title: Petit Apetit - Nowy Swiat
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Bakery, French, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. French bakery & bistro. In Mar 2016 it began offering a vegan croissant (with spelt flour, vegan butter), a vegan breakfast set (fruit salad, porridge, nuts, orange juice, coffee), and a lunch option (couscous with vegetables). Most breads and soups are also vegan.
